programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Sweet Treats to Tickle Your Taste Buds from the Midwest
programme.desc: Sink your teeth into the Midwest's sweets. From the messy madness of puppy chow to kolaches to the infamous buckeye, enjoy the delicious confections that make the region a haven for dessert lovers.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Special Olympics Champ Boogies Through Bucketlist
programme.desc: Chris has an unstoppable spirit, despite the challenges of Down syndrome. His resilience has propelled him to extraordinary achievements, including clinching the gold in Greece. Meaghan takes him on a whirlwind of experiences tailored just for him.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Mysterious Slayings in a Wealthy Family
programme.desc: Detectives are baffled after a mother and daughter in an affluent family are murdered outside Louisville. A year later, a triple homicide in North Carolina sends detectives on an explosive search, linking the two cases through an unlikely suspect.

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Put That Sauce on Anything
programme.desc: Chef Manny Hernandez of Barrels and Boards in Raynham pushes the pace against Chef Ryan Dziki of Wild Fox Pierogi. Will the chefs be able to identify the right ingredients and replicate each other’s sauces before the clock runs out?

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Florida Fugitive
programme.desc: Weeks after a pregnant woman is shot and killed in Orlando, a shootout between her suspected killer and a police officer sparks a manhunt.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Burlington Athletes Overcome Obstacles in the Most Vermont of Ways
programme.desc: From a skier who turned her tragedy into the state's biggest charity event, to a cyclist who energizes others with maple syrup, you can't take the "Vermont" out of Burlington athletes.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Miya Marcano Story
programme.desc: When homesick college student Miya Marcano books a flight to south Florida for the weekend, her family is thrilled. But when the plane lands, Miya is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Heartwarming Viral Sensations Worth the Replay
programme.desc: Going viral is harder than it seems. These stories showcase the moments that cut through the noise, whether they made someone laugh or warmed a heart.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Anguish in Anderson
programme.desc: After a South Carolina couple vanishes, social media posts begin cropping up claiming the pair is fine and eloped. But their loved ones are convinced they're not the ones who penned the posts, and the truth is more shocking than anyone imagined.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Collect $200 And Do Paso Robles, CA
programme.desc: If it’s pleasure you seek, you’ll find it here. Delight in sipping luxurious wines or crave elevated dining experiences? Satisfy your urges in this alluring town. We’ll take you on a thrilling ride and bring you to fields that glow.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Finding Forgiveness With Mom, Reconnecting With Homeless Father
programme.desc: Justin and Ryan both work through their difficult relationships with their parents and find a way to help them move into a new home.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Selective Single Getting Creative to Find Love
programme.desc: Randi, a 29-year-old single from Omaha, is ready to date three lovely ladies. Will she find a connection with Karen, will Leia pull all the right heartstrings or will things get spicy with Emily?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Don’t Cave Into The Pressure
programme.desc: Ivan Gomez is on a weight loss journey, but it’s one that’s been limited to exercising in his home. Kinga meets Ivan in Stockton, CA to show him how the outdoors can be a personal gym for body, mind and spirit.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: All Around The Wait, What Happened World
programme.desc: In this season's finale, Frank Nicotero finds a couple of good sports in New Orleans and Cincinnati. Watch as he revisits the most absurd moments from the first two seasons.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.sub-title: Absolutely Albuquerque: Shaking Things Up
programme.desc: Old classics get a fun twist. Amanda hits the town with expert mixologist Kate Gerwin, who introduces her to a custom sneaker shop, a new pizza place with some unexpected ingredients, and the city’s unique lowrider scene.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Unexpected Eats with Midwest Flair
programme.desc: Uncover the Midwest's unexpected. From quirky to inventive flavor mash-ups like the bulgogi burger to the questionable sour cream & raisin pie, see how the area crafts some interesting but delightful culinary concoctions.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Women's Day: Nurturing Nurse Steps Up To The Front Line For A Day Full Of Surprises
programme.desc: Dedicated mom and nurse, Cleo, spends a day filled with surprises. This incredible mother has overcome obstacles no parent should have to face. Cleo and her sons cook up some quality time.

programme.title: The Spark
programme.sub-title: The Spark: Dancing Diplomat
programme.desc: Dancer. Educator. Diplomat. Peacemaker. Aysha Upchurch is a force of nature. But it is her gift for inspiring students that makes her the real star.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Super Rare Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: From a 300-year-old violin valued at $6 million, to thousands of rare books, thieves will go to wild, even dangerous, lengths to snatch up irreplaceable treasures. For investigators, it's a race against the clock to recover these priceless valuables.

programme.title: WGAL Local News
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Get the latest local news and weather from WGAL.

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Power of One
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: News 8 is following the journey of a young York County woman with a stage 4 terminal cancer diagnosis as part of our series, "Power of One".

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join WGAL News 8's Anne Shannon for "Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project," where we relive the best of 2024 through the eyes of our award-winning photojournalists.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.sub-title: FIXT: Radio Host Needs Teeth Fixed Before Wedding Day
programme.desc: Mikey’s getting married soon and the clock is ticking to get his teeth picture-perfect. Lynn’s embarrassed by the color of her teeth and won’t wait another moment for a white smile. Can the FIXT team get the work done in time?

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: A Concert for Kindness and Bikes for Everyone
programme.desc: Justin and Ryan team up with Elliot, a friend who helped Recycle Percussion get their start years ago. Together they pull off an epic hometown concert where every kid receives a bike and Elliot reveals a final act of kindness he has up his sleeve.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation Challenge: Screenprinters Pull Paint with True Grit to Honor Old West
programme.desc: It’s time to saddle up as three Oklahoma natives pull themselves to victory creating original screen print deigns encapsulating the Old West. Do these makers have the true grit it takes to be Maker Nation Champion?

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation: Paper + Beads
programme.desc: Mardi Gras beading in New Orleans and a paper-folding artist in Austin.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: The Oddest Cases of Family on the Wrong Side of the Law
programme.desc: Siblings stealing money from a Girl Scout? A father-daughter burglary ring? In these unusual cases, family members find themselves in hot water with the justice system.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Professor of Business Seeks Masters in Love
programme.desc: Lacee is a driven, successful professor who's ready to put down her books and pick up her love life. Who will get top marks for her affection?

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.sub-title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: The Middle Child
programme.sub-title: News 9 True Crime: The Middle Child
programme.desc: (2022) In the 1980s, a serial killer buried a woman and three girls in the woods of New Hampshire. One of those girls is still unidentified. WMUR joins the investigators who promise they won’t give up until her name is restored.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Toy Box Killer
programme.desc: One evening in 1999, Cythnia Jaramillo shows up at a home wearing nothing but a dog collar. She had been tortured and sexually assaulted for days. Her escape leads investigators to discover a gruesome string of kidnappings and murders.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In “Free Spirit,” award-winning bartender and host Kate Gerwin takes to the road and meets people in their workplaces and their favorite watering holes.
